name: Mark Giesbrecht
content: University of Waterloo Identity and Access Management (WatIAM) | WatIAM | University of Waterloo Skip to main content University of Waterloo Identity and Access Management (WatIAM) WatIAM usernames are used by the University's central systems, including Quest, WaterlooWorks, LEARN, myHRinfo, and Microsoft 365. Access the WatIAM system toÂ manage your username and password, including addressing a forgotten username or password.
